Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) book on Gem Symbology O-Z
A $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) book on Gem Symbology, covering gems that alphabetically start with the letters O-Z.
A $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) book on Gem Symbology, covering the letters O-Z.

A blood-red ruby soft leather book. On the upper portion of the cover is the title of 'Gem Symbology O-Z' and printed smaller beneath it are the words 'edited and compiled by Demeter'. The border of the cover neatly displays an embossed trail of gems.
$(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) book cover

A $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) book. On the upper portion of the cover is the title of 'Gem Symbology O-Z' and printed smaller beneath it are the words 'edited and compiled by Demeter'. The border of the cover neatly displays a trail of embossed gems.

A blood-red ruby soft leather book. On the upper portion of the cover is the title of 'Gem Symbology O-Z' and printed smaller beneath it are the words 'edited and compiled by Demeter'. The border of the cover neatly displays a trail of embossed gems.
Gem Symbology: Letter O

"Gems starting with the letter O:
* Mahogany Obsidian is called the mirror Stone because it reflects ones personal shortcomings, allowing these shortcomings to come to ones consciousness to be dealt with, then let go of. It is believed to stimulate growth of physical, emotional, intellectual and spiritual centers to provide strength in times of need. It is also said to help promote a forgiving attitude and release of grievances.
* Snowflake Obsidian: Those who appreciate the powers of obsidian often carry a piece with them. Whether in the raw or formed state, obsidian helps with the integration of mental balance between the right and left hemispheres of the brain. It also assists in physical balance and with physical safety. Specifically, snowflake obsidian is believed to be a stone of purity helping one to recognize unnecessary patterns in ones life.
* Black Onyx has been believed to repel negativity and deflect the negativity of others, keeping one safe from harm. It aids in grounding so that the person is not so flighty and can think and at in a more rational manner which will help stimulate the power of wise decision making. It is also believed to help overcome feeling of loneliness and alienation and to add comfort in unfamiliar surroundings.
* Fire Opal is a stone of inspiration, which enhances imagination and creativity. It helps one release inhibitions and enhances memory."

"Gems starting with the letter O:
* Mahogany Obsidian is called the mirror Stone because it reflects ones personal shortcomings, allowing these shortcomings to come to ones consciousness to be dealt with, then let go of. It is believed to stimulate growth of physical, emotional, intellectual and spiritual centers to provide strength in times of need. It is also said to help promote a forgiving attitude and release of grievances.
* Snowflake Obsidian: Those who appreciate the powers of obsidian often carry a piece with them. Whether in the raw or formed state, obsidian helps with the integration of mental balance between the right and left hemispheres of the brain. It also assists in physical balance and with physical safety. Specifically, snowflake obsidian is believed to be a stone of purity helping one to recognize unnecessary patterns in ones life.

It aids in grounding so that the person is not so flighty and can think and at in a more rational manner which will help stimulate the power of wise decision making. It is also believed to help overcome feeling of loneliness and alienation and to add comfort in unfamiliar surroundings.
* Fire Opal is a stone of inspiration, which enhances imagination and creativity. It helps one release inhibitions and enhances memory."
Gem Symbology: Letter P

"Gems starting with the letter P:
* Pearls promote sincerity, truth and loyalty. Enhances personal integrity,soothes, calms, yet focuses attention.
* Peridot is said to help one find happiness within ones self and to overcome anger and jealousy.
* Pietersite has attributes that include physical protections, especially for the eyes. It also focuses the inner eye, enabling the wearer to explore himself or herself emotionally and to help one see beyond the immediate to beauty in the All;. Spiritually and psychically, pietersite helps in working with angels, experiencing visions, and precognition, relating to feminine or goddess energy."

"Gems starting with the letter P:
* Pearls promote sincerity, truth and loyalty. Enhances personal integrity,soothes, calms, yet focuses attention.
* Peridot is said to help one find happiness within ones self and to overcome anger and jealousy.
* Pietersite has attributes that include physical protections, especially for the eyes. It also focuses the inner eye, enabling the wearer to explore himself or herself emotionally and to help one see beyond the immediate to beauty in the All;. Spiritually and psychically, pietersite helps in working with angels, experiencing visions, and precognition, relating to feminine or goddess energy."
Gem Symbology: Letter Q

"Gems starting with the letter Q:
* Quartz Crystal has been recognized for harmony and has been used as a stone of power;, being able to bring the energy of the stars into the soul. It stimulates brain function, aids clarity of mind, dispels negativity in ones environment and is a very powerful healer.
* Rose Quartz is believed to restore youthful qualities, particularly of the skin and self-esteem. Those who wear it experience the joy of each new day and each new experience. They are able to appreciate the innate beauty of people and objects. Everything symbolic regarding rose quartz always returns to love and beauty.
* Smoky Quartz is said to alleviate stress and transform fear, anger and other negative emotions into positive energies, thus having a comforting and calming effect. It is also said to provide clarity of thought, improve intuition, enhance survival instincts and stimulate higher awareness in meditative states."

"Gems starting with the letter Q:
* Quartz Crystal has been recognized for harmony and has been used as a stone of power, being able to bring the energy of the stars into the soul. It stimulates brain function, aids clarity of mind, dispels negativity in ones environment and is a very powerful healer.
* Rose Quartz is believed to restore youthful qualities, particularly of the skin and self-esteem. Those who wear it experience the joy of each new day and each new experience. They are able to appreciate the innate beauty of people and objects. Everything symbolic regarding rose quartz always returns to love and beauty.
* Smoky Quartz is said to alleviate stress and transform fear, anger and other negative emotions into positive energies, thus having a comforting and calming effect. It is also said to provide clarity of thought, improve intuition, enhance survival instincts and stimulate higher awareness in meditative states."
Gem Symbology: Letter R

"Gems starting with the letter R:
* Rhodonite is believed to stabilize ones thinking into what is true for oneself. It helps in making fine distinctions in people. Rather than black-and-white judgments like good or bad, the wearer sees others as brothers and sisters, with all their complexities, worthy of love. It brings love around you and helps you remain centered when you are in the love state. When carried or worn, it allows you to see the love in all of lifes experiences, even in the simplest of daily chores."

"Gems starting with the letter R:
* Rhodonite is believed to stabilize ones thinking into what is true for oneself. It helps in making fine distinctions in people. Rather than black-and-white judgments like good or bad, the wearer sees others as brothers and sisters, with all their complexities, worthy of love. It brings love around you and helps you remain centered when you are in the love state. When carried or worn, it allows you to see the love in all of lifes experiences, even in the simplest of daily chores."
Gem Symbology: Letter S

"Gems starting with the letter S:
* Sodalite assisted ancient truth seekers. Its presence helps call out the inner truths in ourselves from those around us, and helps one let go of control and be in a peaceful state. Sodalite clears the mind for deeper and wiser thinking by aiding the shift from emotional to rational thinking.
* Sunstone evokes learning, stretching and evolving qualities in order to meet our greatest potential."

"Gems starting with the letter S:
* Sodalite assisted ancient truth seekers. Its presence helps call out the inner truths in ourselves from those around us, and helps one let go of control and be in a peaceful state. Sodalite clears the mind for deeper and wiser thinking by aiding the shift from emotional to rational thinking.
* Sunstone evokes learning, stretching and evolving qualities in order to meet our greatest potential."
Gem Symbology: Letter T

"Gems starting with the letter T:
* Tigereye is dramatized with movement as the chatoyant effect of the contrasting golden and brown bands.
* Red Tigereye is an excellent stone for public speaking and presentations. The qualities of this stone enhance the confidence in oneself and the subject being presented. It allows the clarity of thought to be projected with profound sensitivity to the needs of the audience.
* Tiger Iron is believed that the metaphysical power it has is more immediate and obvious than that of any other stone.
* Tourmaline, for those of us who seek to know our inner truths. The quest is without fear; the direction is obvious. But the natural inertia we often feel is overcome by a new-born peace. Keep tourmaline available for those times you need it the most to get motivated.
* Turquoise is said to absorb negative energies, enhance intuition, and give the wearer vibrancy. This is a stone of vision, integration and clarity."

"Gems starting with the letter T:

* Red Tigereye is an excellent stone for public speaking and presentations. The qualities of this stone enhance the confidence in oneself and the subject being presented. It allows the clarity of thought to be projected with profound sensitivity to the needs of the audience.
* Tiger Iron is believed that the metaphysical power it has is more immediate and obvious than that of any other stone.

* Turquoise is said to absorb negative energies, enhance intuition, and give the wearer vibrancy. This is a stone of vision, integration and clarity."
Book Symbology: Letter U

"Gems starting with the letter U:
* Unakite is said to bring unconditional love of humanity, connection and reunion. It can help with healing of abandonment and separation issues."

"Gems starting with the letter U:
* Unakite is said to bring unconditional love of humanity, connection and reunion. It can help with healing of abandonment and separation issues."
Gem Symbology: Letter Z

"Gems starting with the letter Z:
* Zoisite: Many artists, who see their art as an extension of their individual spiritual natures, value zoisite. When you need a creativity boost, use zoisite as a touchstone."

"Gems starting with the letter Z:
* Zoisite: Many artists, who see their art as an extension of their individual spiritual natures, value zoisite. When you need a creativity boost, use zoisite as a touchstone."
the $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material) book's spine
The spine of the book is made from $(this.trait:color) $(this.trait:material).

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] \$delay(2, TRUE, "030f"); EmitTo( \$actor, "The book does not react to you in any way except to look more daunting and self-assured in its knowledge.");
